meanings: be[come, go] near(doing), almost, nearly, just barely escape(doing)

meanings.meaning: within an inch of something/of doing something

vlive.korean: 후디, 이런 건 너무 뻔한데? Hoodies? It's cliche. 듣기 View video NCT : 자연스럽게 자연에서 💚
이건 너무 뻔한데... This is too obvious... 듣기 View video NCT : NCT LIFE in Chiang Mai EP 05
오늘 언니의 3행시는 그래도 뻔한데 약간 웃겼대요. Fans say your poem was still funny. 듣기 View video DSPmedia : [디.훈.소_6탄] 영지와 함께하는~ 복불복♪
vlive.english: Fans say your poem was still funny.

vlive.korean: 2배속은 너무 뻔한 것 같고요. -아닌데요, 안 뻔한데요. It's too obvious. - No, it's not. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : WANNA.B - 워너비 '워너비의 너비마블♬'
vlive.english: It's too obvious. - No, it's not.

vlive.korean: 이 자리에서요? -여기서 제기의 왕중왕전을. -결과는 뻔한 거 아닐까요? -어떻게 뻔한데요? Here? - The result is obvious. - How come it's obvious? 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : BLOOMY - 블루미 '할로윈 홍대습격!!'
vlive.english: Here? - The result is obvious. - How come it's obvious?

examples.korean: I just know my boss is going to ask, and I don't want to look foolish. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 제 상사가 물어볼 게 뻔한데, 바보처럼 보이기가 싫거든요. DARAKWON
examples.english: I just know my boss is going to ask, and I don't want to look foolish. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: You should turn and run, this battle does not look good for you. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 싸워봤자 결과는 뻔한데 지금이라도 후퇴하지 그래. hansemEUG
examples.english: You should turn and run, this battle does not look good for you. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I know it's yours, so I know it's wrong. My theory. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그놈의 헛소리, 들어보나마나 틀릴 게 뻔한데 뭐 하러 들어? 내 이야기가 정답이야. hansemEUG
examples.english: I know it's yours, so I know it's wrong. My theory. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 제의를 거절했다면 현명하지 못한 일이 될 뻔했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would have been impolitic to refuse his offer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She was rescued from a watery grave. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 수장[익사]될 뻔하다가 구출되었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She was rescued from a watery grave. Add to Wordbook
